'''Bloomfield Township''' is a township in [[Fillmore County, Minnesota|Fillmore County]], [[Minnesota]], [[United States]]. The population was 414 at the 2000 census. ==Geography== According to the [[United States Census Bureau]], the township has a total area of {{convert|35.7|sqmi|km2}}, of which {{convert|35.7|sqmi|km2}} of it is land and {{convert|0.04|sqmi|km2}} of it (0.08%) is water. ==Demographics== As of the [[census]]{{GR|2}} of 2000, there were 414 people, 146 households, and 122 families residing in the township. The [[population density]] was 11.6 people per square mile (4.5/km²). There were 157 housing units at an average density of 4.4/sq mi (1.7/km²). The racial makeup of the township was 99.03% [[White (U.S. Census)|White]], 0.24% [[African American (U.S. Census)|African American]], 0.48% [[Asian (U.S. Census)|Asian]], and 0.24% from two or more races. There were 146 households out of which 39.7% had children under the age of 18 living with them, 79.5% were [[Marriage|married couples]] living together, 2.1% had a female householder with no husband present, and 16.4% were non-families. 15.1% of all households were made up of individuals and 6.2% had someone living alone who was 65 years of age or older. The average household size was 2.84 and the average family size was 3.17. In the township the population was spread out with 28.7% under the age of 18, 5.8% from 18 to 24, 28.3% from 25 to 44, 21.7% from 45 to 64, and 15.5% who were 65 years of age or older. The median age was 37 years. For every 100 females there were 110.2 males. For every 100 females age 18 and over, there were 110.7 males. The median income for a household in the township was $47,813, and the median income for a family was $51,750. Males had a median income of $30,000 versus $29,107 for females. The [[per capita income]] for the township was $20,577. About 2.4% of families and 5.4% of the population were below the [[poverty line]], including 8.8% of those under age 18 and none of those age 65 or over. ==References== {{reflist}} {{Fillmore County, Minnesota}} [[Category:Townships in Fillmore County, Minnesota]]
